climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: ✔PILLOWS STANDARD SIZE SET OF 2 -- Each order will include two Hotel Quality Bed Pillows that are finished with well stitching and reinforced seams. An ideal choice for side, stomach and back sleepers as these pillows have a high loft and offer maximum comfort for any sleeping position.

✔SOFT & SUPPORTIVE PILLOWS -- Since our down alternative pillows are made with a great balance of softness and plump firmness, so whether you prefer soft or firm pillows, these pillows are perfect for you!

✔BREATHABLE & MACHINE WASHABLE PILLOWS -- Filled with 100% micro polyester fiber which makes the pillows fluffy and cozy. Quality shell ensure the pillow breathable and skin friendly. Machine washable capabilities enable Maintenance of its reusability and fresh appearance. Air dry or tumble dry after washing.

✔GREAT RESILIENCE -- Quickly return to its original size of 20x26 inches after releasing from the vacuum sealed package, fluff the pillow regularly to retain its shape after long use. Pls allow 24 hours for them to fluff up completely.
✔SAFE & SOUND - These luxury bed pillows are made in an OEKO-TEX Standard Certified factory that ensures textiles meet high safety and environmental standards.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE OPTIMAL CHOICE FOR ALL TYPES OF SLEEPING POSITIONS I am a BACK sleeper and they provide the perfect amount of support for my head without giving me a kink in my neck. Perfect firmness for SIDE sleeping or between your knees. They are fluffy but firm. STOMACH sleepers everywhere rejoice! This pillow really does what it claims.
Previous page Next page 1 HOW TO PREP 2 HOW TO CLEAN

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Dreamy Pair of Pillows
reviews.reviewText: If you're in search of the perfect pillows for a good night's sleep, look no further than the JOLLYVOGUE Bed Pillows. This set of two pillows is a real dream come true! With their cooling and supportive features, they are ideal for side and back sleepers like myself.One of the things I love about these pillows is their high loft and plush firmness. Whether you prefer a soft or firm pillow, these JOLLYVOGUE pillows strike the perfect balance. They provide a soft and comfortable surface to rest your head on, while still offering the necessary support for a restful sleep.The pillows are filled with 100% micro polyester fiber, which not only makes them fluffy and cozy but also ensures breathability. No more waking up in the middle of the night feeling hot and sweaty! The quality shell is also skin-friendly, adding to the overall comfort.Maintenance is a breeze with these pillows. They are machine washable, allowing for easy cleaning and the maintenance of their fresh appearance. Simply toss them in the washing machine, and they'll come out looking and smelling as good as new. Just remember to air dry or tumble dry them afterward.One of the standout features of these pillows is their resilience. Despite being vacuum-sealed for shipping, they quickly regain their original size of 20x26 inches once released. To keep them in optimal shape, make sure to fluff them regularly. They'll bounce back and be ready to provide a cozy resting place for your head night after night.In conclusion, the JOLLYVOGUE Bed Pillows are a fantastic investment for anyone seeking a peaceful and comfortable sleep experience. With their softness, support, and easy maintenance, these pillows truly deliver. So go ahead and grab a pair of these pillows to elevate your sleeping game. You won't be disappointed!Remember, a good night's sleep is no joke, and neither are these incredible pillows from JOLLYVOGUE!

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars More medium than soft
reviews.reviewText: Was hoping for soft these are a bit fuller but perfect for a sham vs sleeping for those wanting super soft

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for our guest room. My guest always bring her own pillows when she travels. She said she used these instead of her own and asked where I got them. These are great pillows at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice but very thick
reviews.reviewText: very thick very nice, a little too thick for me but I manage. great quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great if you like flat pillows
reviews.reviewText: The pillows seem to be well-made and look expensive. They are very soft. They flatten out pretty much right away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I should have brought they ages ago. I have tried memory foam , all the other buckwheat etc . I sleep better than a baby. Soft and firm at the same time, how do they do that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I used these for decor pillows but they are great! Love the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is my second set. The first set lasted 4 years, They are comfortable and a decent value.

Got these before family visited to pump up one of the guest beds. Wound up stealing them for my own bed. Here's the rundown:First, they come vacuum sealed. I opened them and left them out for a week, not sure if they off-gas or anything like that as a result. I threw them in pillow cases and slept with them - no smell. Very comfortable. They are THICK, though, I am a stomach sleeper and find them great to smash my head into and drift off into nothingness with. My wife, however, sleeps on her back and finds them thick. I'd imagine they'll calm down a little bit but - a pillow that's too fluffy - that's a good problem to have.All-in-all, a great buy. They remind me of the pillows you find in hotels.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very comfortable. Just the right firmness.
reviews.reviewText: I gambled with this pillow and was really happy with it. Been using it for a few months now and it’s just the right firmness for me. Yes, it’s bigger then the standard sized pillows but it’s serves its purpose.

reviews.reviewTitle: Not the best for Side Sleepers
reviews.reviewText: I am a side sleeper and this is my personal experience but I found them too fluffy (not flat enough) and so my head was barley on the pillow and woke up with a kinked neck. However, if you like the fluffier, bigger pillows then this is for you. It's soft, well made and I let them rise for 24 hours, and they were wrinkle free. Great product, just not great for me.Recommend to the right sleeper!
